forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.linkExpiry: The link will expire in 1 hour. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
forgotPassword.success: If an account exists, you'll receive an email shortly.

hero.title: Your Organization's Intelligence,
hero.subtitle: Datacendia is the command center for enterprise intelligence. Connect your data, consult AI advisors, and see possible futures — all while keeping complete control.

problem.title: The Problem with Enterprise Intelligence
problem.subtitle: Organizations struggle with fragmented data, siloed tools, and reactive decision-making

dataChaos.title: Data Chaos
dataChaos.description: Your data lives in dozens of systems with no unified view. Nobody knows what's true.

toolSprawl.title: Tool Sprawl
toolSprawl.description: BI tools, analytics platforms, dashboards — none of them talk to each other.

noForesight.title: No Foresight
noForesight.description: You're always looking in the rear-view mirror. What about what's coming next?

solution.title: The Cortex: Your Intelligence Command Center
solution.subtitle: Five integrated spaces that give you complete visibility and control

pillars.title: The 8 Pillars of Sovereign Intelligence
pillars.subtitle: Every capability you need, working together as one

cta.title: Ready to take control of your intelligence?
cta.subtitle: See how Datacendia can transform your organization's decision-making

helm.name: The Helm
helm.longDescription: Your command center for strategic decisions. Track KPIs, monitor performance, and steer your organization with confidence.

lineage.name: The Lineage
lineage.description: Trace every data point to its source
lineage.longDescription: Complete data provenance tracking. Know where your data comes from, how it transforms, and where it goes.

predict.name: The Predict
predict.longDescription: Machine learning models that forecast trends, detect anomalies, and surface insights before they become obvious.

flow.name: The Flow
flow.longDescription: Intelligent workflow automation that connects your systems and processes with AI-driven decision points.

health.name: The Health
health.longDescription: Real-time monitoring of your organization's vital signs across data, systems, and processes.

guard.name: The Guard
guard.longDescription: Automated policy enforcement, access controls, and compliance monitoring to keep your data secure.

ethics.name: The Ethics
ethics.longDescription: Ethical guardrails that ensure responsible AI use, fair algorithms, and transparent decision-making.

agents.name: The Agents
agents.longDescription: Specialized AI agents that provide domain-specific expertise and collaborate to solve complex problems.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your organization. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

foundation.name: Foundation
foundation.description: Essential intelligence capabilities for growing teams

intelligence.name: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Advanced analytics and forecasting for scaling organizations

governance.name: Governance
governance.description: Complete governance and compliance for regulated industries

sovereign.name: Sovereign
sovereign.description: Full platform with complete data sovereignty

trial.q: Can I try before I buy?
trial.a: Yes! All plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to features.

data.q: What happens to my data if I cancel?
data.a: Your data remains yours. Export everything before cancellation, or we'll retain it for 30 days.

nonprofit.q: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits?
nonprofit.a: Yes, we offer 50% off for qualified nonprofits and educational institutions.

upgrade.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
upgrade.a: Absolutely. Changes take effect at your next billing cycle, prorated if upgrading.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Here's how {{company}} is doing today
dashboard.whatToKnow: What would you like to know?

sampleAlerts.memoryLeak: Memory leak detected in auth service

council.title: The Council
council.subtitle: AI-powered strategic advisory panel
council.questionPlaceholder: What strategic question would you like the council to deliberate on?

modes.title: Council Modes Library
modes.subtitle: The same 10 agents with different modes produce radically different outputs.
modes.cultureNote: The prompt IS the company culture.

customAgent.title: Create Custom Agent
customAgent.subtitle: Design your own AI agent with specialized expertise
customAgent.name: Agent Name
customAgent.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this agent does and its areas of focus...

chief.name: Chief Strategy Agent
chief.description: Synthesizes insights from all domain agents to provide holistic strategic recommendations.

cfo.name: Financial Intelligence Agent
cfo.description: Analyzes financial data, budgets, forecasts, and provides insights on fiscal health.

coo.name: Operations Intelligence Agent
coo.description: Focuses on operational metrics, process efficiency, and resource allocation.

ciso.name: Security & Compliance Agent
ciso.description: Monitors security posture, compliance requirements, and threat assessment.

cmo.name: Market Intelligence Agent
cmo.description: Analyzes market trends, customer behavior, and competitive intelligence.

cro.name: Revenue Intelligence Agent
cro.description: Focuses on revenue optimization, sales performance, and pricing strategies.

cdo.name: Data Quality Agent
cdo.description: Monitors data quality, governance policies, and ensures data integrity.

risk.name: Risk Assessment Agent
risk.description: Evaluates enterprise risks, performs impact analysis, and provides mitigation strategies.

clo.name: Legal Intelligence Agent
clo.description: Analyzes legal risks, contract implications, and regulatory compliance.

cpo.name: Product Strategy Agent
cpo.description: Drives product strategy, feature prioritization, and user experience insights.

caio.name: AI Strategy Agent
caio.description: Guides AI strategy, model governance, and ethical AI implementation.

cso.name: Sustainability Agent
cso.description: Monitors environmental, social, and governance metrics and sustainability initiatives.

cio.name: Investment Intelligence Agent
cio.description: Analyzes investment opportunities, portfolio allocation, and capital deployment.

cco.name: Communications Agent
cco.description: Crafts corporate messaging, manages stakeholder communications, and monitors brand perception.

ext-auditor.name: External Auditor
ext-auditor.description: Provides independent, objective assessment from an external perspective.

int-auditor.name: Internal Auditor
int-auditor.description: Evaluates internal controls, operational efficiency, and compliance.

cmio.name: Chief Medical Information Officer
cmio.description: Expert in healthcare technology, EHR systems, and clinical informatics.

pso.name: Patient Safety Officer
pso.description: Specialist in patient safety, adverse event prevention, and quality improvement.

hco.name: Healthcare Compliance Officer
hco.description: Expert in healthcare regulatory compliance, HIPAA, and billing compliance.

cod.name: Clinical Operations Director
cod.description: Expert in clinical operations, patient flow, and staffing optimization.

quant.name: Quantitative Analyst
quant.description: Expert in quantitative finance, derivatives pricing, and risk modeling.

pm.name: Portfolio Manager
pm.description: Expert in portfolio construction, asset allocation, and investment strategy.

cro-finance.name: Credit Risk Officer
cro-finance.description: Expert in credit analysis, loan underwriting, and credit risk modeling.

treasury.name: Treasury Analyst
treasury.description: Expert in corporate treasury, cash management, and FX hedging.

contracts.name: Contract Specialist
contracts.description: Expert in commercial contracts, contract drafting, and negotiation.

ip.name: Intellectual Property Counsel
ip.description: Expert in intellectual property law, patent strategy, and trademark protection.

litigation.name: Litigation Expert
litigation.description: Expert in commercial litigation, dispute resolution, and e-discovery.

regulatory.name: Regulatory Affairs Counsel
regulatory.description: Expert in regulatory compliance, government affairs, and administrative law.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.message: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

helm.title: The Helm - Strategic Command Center
helm.summary: Your organization's strategic decision support system. Monitor, analyze, and steer with confidence.
features: Real-time KPI dashboards with trend analysis
useCases: Track quarterly objectives across all departments
Monitor revenue metrics and growth indicators
helm.guidance: Start by defining your key metrics. The Helm works best when you have clear, measurable objectives aligned with your organization's strategy.

lineage.title: The Lineage - Data Provenance Tracker
lineage.summary: Complete visibility into your data's journey. Know where every number comes from and where it goes.
features: Data quality scoring at each stage
useCases: Plan system migrations with full impact visibility
lineage.guidance: Connect your data sources first. The Lineage automatically discovers relationships and builds your data map.

predict.title: The Predict - AI Forecasting Engine
predict.summary: Machine learning models that see around corners. Forecast trends before they become obvious.
features: Anomaly detection and early warning system
useCases: Predict customer churn before it happens
Model financial scenarios for strategic planning
predict.guidance: Quality predictions require quality data. Start with clean historical data and let The Predict learn your patterns.

flow.title: The Flow - Intelligent Automation
flow.summary: Workflows that think. Connect systems, automate decisions, and keep work flowing.
useCases: Trigger actions based on AI insights
flow.guidance: Map your current manual processes first. The Flow helps you identify automation opportunities and implement them step by step.

health.title: The Health - System Vitality Monitor
health.summary: Real-time pulse on your organization's vital signs. Know when something's wrong before it breaks.
useCases: Monitor system health across all platforms
Track incident response and resolution times
health.guidance: Configure health checks for your critical systems. The Health aggregates signals to give you a unified view.

guard.title: The Guard - Security & Compliance Shield
guard.summary: Automated protection for your data. Enforce policies, track access, and stay compliant.
useCases: Detect and respond to security threats
guard.guidance: Define your security policies and compliance requirements. The Guard monitors continuously and alerts on violations.

ethics.title: The Ethics - AI Governance Center
ethics.summary: Responsible AI built-in. Ensure fairness, transparency, and accountability in every decision.
useCases: Review AI models for bias before deployment
ethics.guidance: Establish your ethical principles first. The Ethics helps you operationalize them across all AI systems.

agents.title: The Agents - AI Advisory Council
agents.summary: Specialized AI advisors for every domain. Get expert guidance on demand.
useCases: Get strategic advice from business analysts
Consult technical experts for architecture decisions
Receive compliance guidance from regulatory specialists
agents.guidance: Choose the right agent for your question. Each agent has specialized knowledge - the Council knows when to collaborate.

graph.title: The Graph - Knowledge Navigator
graph.summary: Navigate your organization's knowledge universe. See connections others miss.
graph.guidance: Explore by clicking any node. The Graph reveals connections and lets you drill down into details.

council.title: The Council - AI Collaboration Chamber
council.summary: Where AI advisors deliberate together. Complex problems need multiple perspectives.
council.guidance: Present your question to The Council. Watch as different perspectives emerge and synthesize into recommendations.

pulse.title: The Pulse - Real-Time Operations Center
pulse.summary: Live view of your organization's heartbeat. Every metric, every moment.
pulse.guidance: Configure your key metrics to appear on The Pulse. Set alert thresholds to get notified of changes.

lens.title: The Lens - Future Scenario Explorer
lens.summary: See possible futures before they arrive. Model scenarios and plan accordingly.
lens.guidance: Define your scenario parameters. The Lens generates multiple futures and shows you the most likely outcomes.

bridge.title: The Bridge - Action Command Center
bridge.summary: Turn insights into action. Execute across all your connected systems.
bridge.guidance: Select your action and preview its impact. The Bridge ensures safe execution with full traceability.

mirror.title: Cendia Mirror - Digital Twin Engine
mirror.summary: Create living digital replicas of your organization. Test changes before they go live.
mirror.guidance: Mirror creates a safe sandbox of your organization. Experiment freely - changes here won't affect production.

witness.title: Cendia Witness - Immutable Audit Trail
witness.summary: Blockchain-backed evidence of every action. Prove what happened and when.
witness.guidance: Witness automatically records critical actions. Access the immutable record anytime for audits or investigations.

oracle.title: Cendia Oracle - Predictive Intelligence Hub
oracle.summary: Advanced AI that speaks truth to power. Get answers that matter.
oracle.guidance: Ask Oracle anything about your organization. It synthesizes knowledge from all sources to give you accurate answers.

legacy.title: Cendia Legacy - Knowledge Preservation
legacy.summary: Capture institutional knowledge before it walks out the door. Preserve wisdom for the future.
legacy.guidance: Record critical knowledge as it's created. Legacy ensures your organization's wisdom outlives any individual.

mirage.title: Cendia Mirage - Synthetic Data Generator
mirage.summary: Create realistic data without privacy risks. Train, test, and develop safely.
mirage.guidance: Define your data requirements. Mirage generates synthetic datasets that match your real data's characteristics.

key.title: Cendia Key - Identity & Access Vault
key.summary: One key to rule them all. Unified identity management across your entire ecosystem.
key.guidance: Connect your identity providers. Key unifies access control and enforces policies across all systems.

notary.title: CendiaNotary™ - Cryptographic Signing Authority
notary.summary: Signs and authenticates all decisions with customer-owned keys. Non-repudiation for every action.
features: AWS KMS, Azure Key Vault, HashiCorp Vault integration
Automatic key rotation with audit trail
Zero-trust: Datacendia never sees your keys
notary.guidance: Configure your preferred KMS provider. Notary signs all decision packets, audit entries, and evidence bundles with cryptographic proof.

vault.title: CendiaVault™ - Unified Evidence Storage
vault.summary: Secure storage for decision packets, audit ledger, evidence bundles, and signed reports. Immutable, searchable, and retention-policy compliant.
vault.guidance: All artifacts from Council decisions, audit events, and compliance exports are automatically stored here with cryptographic integrity.

mesh.title: Cendia Mesh - Integration Fabric
mesh.summary: Connect everything to everything. The intelligent integration layer for your enterprise.
mesh.guidance: Configure your system connections through Mesh. It handles protocols, transformations, and routing automatically.

blackbox.title: Cendia BlackBox - Model Registry
blackbox.summary: Central command for all your AI models. Version, deploy, and monitor with confidence.
blackbox.guidance: Register your models in BlackBox. It tracks versions, manages deployments, and monitors performance automatically.

glass.title: Cendia Glass - Transparency Dashboard
glass.summary: Complete visibility into AI decisions. See exactly why and how decisions were made.
glass.guidance: Select any AI decision in Glass. It breaks down the factors, shows alternatives, and explains the reasoning.

apotheosis.title: CendiaApotheosis™ - Organizational Superintelligence
apotheosis.summary: The self-improvement loop that never stops. Nightly attacks, automatic patches, human upskilling, and pattern bans.
features: Human skill gap detection and training
apotheosis.guidance: Apotheosis runs every night, attacking your organization from 1000+ angles, patching what it finds, and making you permanently immune to your own mistakes.

dissent.title: CendiaDissent™ - Protected Disagreement
dissent.summary: The right to formally, safely, and immutably disagree with any decision — on the record, forever.
dissent.guidance: File a dissent against any decision you disagree with. Your objection will be permanently recorded, acknowledged, and tracked for accuracy over time.

responsibility.title: CendiaResponsibility™ - Human Accountability Layer
responsibility.summary: Explicit human accountability for every AI-assisted decision — signed, sealed, and irrevocable.
features: Explicit risk acceptance with failure categories
responsibility.guidance: When AI makes a recommendation, a human must sign accountability. This creates an immutable record of who accepted which risks and why.

connectors.title: Enterprise Data Connectors
connectors.summary: 156+ pre-built connectors across 11 industry verticals. Connect to government, financial, healthcare, and global data sources.
features: Government: NOAA, FAA, FEMA, SEC, Census, USGS, EIA
Financial: Bloomberg, SWIFT, FIX Protocol, Refinitiv
Healthcare: HL7 FHIR, Epic, Cerner, CDC, FDA, WHO
Supply Chain: CBP, Maersk, Port APIs, UN Comtrade
Energy: CAISO, PJM, ERCOT, ENTSO-E, Nord Pool
useCases: Real-time weather and climate data integration
Financial market data and regulatory feeds
Supply chain visibility and customs compliance
Energy grid and power market analytics
connectors.guidance: Browse connectors by vertical or search for specific data sources. Each connector includes authentication setup, rate limiting, and compliance framework mapping.

evidence.title: Evidence Infrastructure
evidence.summary: Immutable test evidence ledger with blockchain-style hash chaining, TPM-signed digital signatures, and Merkle tree proofs.
useCases: SOC 2 Type II / ISO 27001 / GDPR evidence
evidence.guidance: All test executions are automatically recorded with cryptographic signatures. Generate legal evidence bundles for auditors with one click.

sovereignArch.title: Sovereign Architecture Patterns
sovereignArch.summary: 11 enterprise patterns for air-gapped, zero-trust, and fully sovereign deployments.
features: Data Diode: Unidirectional data ingest with quarantine
Decision DNA: One-click audit artifact export
QR Air-Gap Bridge: Zero-media data transfer
sovereignArch.guidance: Sovereign Architecture patterns enable deployment in the most restricted environments. Each pattern can be used independently or combined.

cascade.title: CendiaCascade™ - The Butterfly Effect
cascade.summary: Second and third-order consequence analysis. Predict the unintended consequences of decisions before they become incidents.
features: Multi-lens analysis (CFO, COO, CISO, People, Ethics)
Guardrail proposals (canary, tripwire, circuit breaker, rollback)
Evidence-grade audit trail with SHA-256 hashing
useCases: Predict vendor swap consequences across supply chain
Model policy changes through organizational graph
Detect feedback loops that amplify small changes
cascade.guidance: Load your organization graph, propose a change, and let CendiaCascade trace consequences through your Knowledge Graph to find the Invisible Consequences. Your competitors play chess one move ahead — CendiaCascade simulates 5 moves deep.

adapters.title: Sovereign Adapters - Universal Connectors
adapters.summary: 5 universal adapters instead of 156 vendor-specific connectors. We provide the socket; the client brings the plug.
features: File Watcher: Avionics, defense, legacy file-based ingest
Webhook Ingest: SaaS, financial gateway push events
Database Adapter: ERP, supply chain SQL/ODBC polling
FHIR Protocol: Healthcare standard (not Epic/Cerner proprietary)
MQTT Protocol: IoT and energy grid data
useCases: Connect to any system via open standards
Avoid licensing liability from proprietary APIs
adapters.guidance: Choose the adapter type that matches your integration pattern. Each adapter enforces risk tiers, evidence logging, and quota controls automatically.

welcome.title: Welcome to Datacendia
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to sovereign intelligence begins here

steps.title: Meet Your Command Center
steps.description: The Cortex is your unified view of organizational intelligence. Five interconnected spaces give you complete visibility and control.

steps.title: Understand the 8 Pillars
steps.description: Each pillar provides essential capabilities - from strategic metrics (Helm) to AI governance (Ethics). They work together as one system.

steps.title: Connect Your First Data Source
steps.description: Intelligence requires data. Connect a database, API, or file source to start building your knowledge base.

steps.title: Define Your Key Metrics
steps.description: What matters most to your organization? Define the KPIs that will appear on your executive dashboard.

steps.title: Start at The Pulse
steps.description: Begin each day with a real-time view of organizational health. Red indicators need immediate attention.

steps.title: Dive into The Helm
steps.description: Examine your strategic KPIs. Are you on track for quarterly objectives? Where are the gaps?

steps.title: Consult The Council
steps.description: For complex decisions, convene your AI advisors. Present the situation and hear multiple perspectives.

steps.title: Explore with The Lens
steps.description: Model different scenarios. What if you increase investment? Delay a launch? The Lens shows possible futures.

steps.title: Take Action via The Bridge
steps.description: Turn decisions into action. The Bridge executes across systems with full audit trails.

dataEngineer.title: Data Engineer's Workflow
dataEngineer.subtitle: Building and maintaining the data foundation

steps.title: Map Your Data with The Lineage
steps.description: Understand how data flows through your organization. The Lineage auto-discovers sources, transformations, and destinations.

steps.title: Monitor Quality in The Health
steps.description: Track data quality metrics across all pipelines. Set up alerts for freshness, completeness, and accuracy.

steps.title: Connect Systems via Cendia Mesh
steps.description: Build integrations between systems. Mesh handles protocols, transformations, and reliability.

steps.title: Automate with The Flow
steps.description: Create automated data pipelines. Schedule jobs, handle errors, and orchestrate complex workflows.

complianceOfficer.title: Compliance Officer's Checklist
complianceOfficer.subtitle: Maintaining regulatory compliance with automated monitoring

steps.title: Review Security Posture in The Guard
steps.description: Check your organization's security stance. Review policy compliance, access patterns, and active threats.

steps.title: Verify AI Ethics in The Ethics
steps.description: Ensure all AI models meet ethical standards. Check for bias, review decisions, and document compliance.

steps.title: Pull Audit Trails from Cendia Witness
steps.description: Access immutable records of all system actions. Generate reports for auditors with cryptographic proof.

steps.title: Explain Decisions with Cendia Glass
steps.description: When regulators ask why, Glass provides the answer. Full explainability for every AI decision.

strategist.title: Strategic Planner's Guide
strategist.subtitle: From insight to strategy with AI-powered analysis

steps.title: Gather Intelligence from The Graph
steps.description: Explore your knowledge base. Discover connections between market data, internal metrics, and competitive intelligence.

steps.title: Forecast Trends with The Predict
steps.description: Use AI models to project key metrics. Understand where current trends are heading.

steps.title: Ask The Oracle
steps.description: Get AI-powered answers to strategic questions. Oracle synthesizes all available knowledge.

steps.title: Model Scenarios in The Lens
steps.description: Build strategic scenarios. What if competitors move? Markets shift? New regulations emerge?

steps.title: Test in Cendia Mirror
steps.description: Simulate your strategic initiatives before committing. Mirror lets you test without risk.

quickStart.title: 5-Minute Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Get oriented and see value immediately

steps.title: View Your Dashboard
steps.description: Your personalized command center shows what matters most. Key metrics, alerts, and recent activity at a glance.

steps.title: Check Organization Health
steps.description: One number tells you how your organization is doing. Green is good. Click to see details.

steps.title: Ask a Question
steps.description: Type any question about your organization. Our AI agents will find the answer.

steps.title: Explore a Metric
steps.description: Click any metric to drill down. See history, trends, and what's driving changes.

crisisResponse.title: Crisis Response Protocol
crisisResponse.subtitle: When things go wrong, move fast with complete information

steps.title: Assess the Situation in The Pulse
steps.description: Get instant visibility into what's happening. Red indicators pinpoint the problem. Cascading impacts are shown in real-time.

steps.title: Trace the Root Cause with The Lineage
steps.description: Follow the data trail backwards. What changed? Where did it start? The Lineage shows you the exact point of failure.

steps.title: Gather Evidence with Cendia Witness
steps.description: Capture the immutable record of what happened. You'll need this for the post-mortem and any compliance requirements.

steps.title: Coordinate Response in The Council
steps.description: Bring together AI experts from different domains. Security, Operations, and Business Continuity agents collaborate on the response plan.

steps.title: Execute Recovery via The Bridge
steps.description: Push fixes and rollbacks across affected systems. The Bridge coordinates the response while maintaining audit trails.

steps.title: Document and Learn in Cendia Legacy
steps.description: Capture what happened and what you learned. Future teams will thank you when they face similar situations.

aiModelLaunch.title: AI Model Deployment Journey
aiModelLaunch.subtitle: From prototype to production with confidence

steps.title: Register Your Model in Cendia BlackBox
steps.description: Upload your trained model to the registry. BlackBox tracks versions, dependencies, and training provenance automatically.

steps.title: Check for Bias in The Ethics
steps.description: Before any model goes live, it must pass ethical review. Run bias detection across demographic slices and document findings.

steps.title: Test with Synthetic Data from Cendia Mirage
steps.description: Generate edge cases and adversarial examples. Make sure your model handles the unexpected without privacy risks.

steps.title: Simulate in Cendia Mirror
steps.description: Deploy to a digital twin first. See how your model performs with real-world traffic patterns before touching production.

steps.title: Configure Explainability in Cendia Glass
steps.description: Every prediction needs to be explainable. Set up factor attribution and counterfactual generation for transparency.

steps.title: Deploy and Monitor with The Predict
steps.description: Go live with confidence. The Predict monitors performance, detects drift, and alerts you to any degradation.

boardPresentation.title: Board Meeting Preparation
boardPresentation.subtitle: Impress the board with data-driven insights

steps.title: Pull Strategic KPIs from The Helm
steps.description: Gather all your key metrics in one place. The Helm shows progress against strategic objectives with trend analysis.

steps.title: Build Forecasts with The Predict
steps.description: Don't just show where you are - show where you're going. Generate projections with confidence intervals.

steps.title: Validate Data with The Lineage
steps.description: Board members will ask tough questions. Know exactly where every number comes from.

steps.title: Model What-If Scenarios in The Lens
steps.description: Be ready for 'What if we...' questions. Pre-model strategic scenarios so you have answers ready.

steps.title: Get AI Synthesis from Cendia Oracle
steps.description: Ask Oracle to synthesize your data into key insights and talking points. It sees patterns humans miss.

steps.title: Ensure Compliance with The Guard
steps.description: Make sure nothing you present creates compliance exposure. The Guard verifies all data meets governance requirements.

newEmployeeOnboarding.title: New Team Member Onboarding
newEmployeeOnboarding.subtitle: Get productive in days, not months

steps.title: Access Your Workspace via Cendia Key
steps.description: One login gives you access to everything you need. Key manages your permissions based on your role.

steps.title: Explore Organizational Knowledge in The Graph
steps.description: Navigate the knowledge universe. Find documentation, experts, and context for your new role.

steps.title: Learn from Cendia Legacy
steps.description: Access institutional knowledge from those who came before. Best practices, decision rationale, and lessons learned.

steps.title: Understand Your Metrics in The Helm
steps.description: Every role has KPIs. Learn what you're measured on and how to track your progress.

steps.title: Set Up Automated Workflows in The Flow
steps.description: Don't reinvent processes. Connect to existing workflows and automate repetitive tasks from day one.

steps.title: Meet Your AI Assistants in The Agents
steps.description: You have AI teammates ready to help. Meet the agents relevant to your role and learn how to collaborate.

steps.title: Map Both Data Landscapes with The Lineage
steps.description: Before you can merge, you need to understand both sides. The Lineage creates a complete map of entities and relationships.

steps.title: Unify Metrics in The Helm
steps.description: Different organizations measure things differently. Harmonize KPI definitions for a single source of truth.

steps.title: Connect Systems via Cendia Mesh
steps.description: Build the integration layer. Mesh handles the complexity of connecting disparate systems with different protocols.

steps.title: Preserve Institutional Knowledge in Cendia Legacy
steps.description: M&A often means losing key people. Capture their knowledge before transitions happen.

steps.title: Merge Identity Systems via Cendia Key
steps.description: Unify who has access to what. Key integrates identity providers and harmonizes permissions.

steps.title: Monitor Integration Health
steps.description: Track the health of your integration in real-time. Catch issues before they become problems.

regulatoryAudit.title: Regulatory Audit Preparation
regulatoryAudit.subtitle: Turn audit season from nightmare to non-event

steps.title: Pull Audit Evidence from Cendia Witness
steps.description: Every action in your organization is recorded. Witness provides cryptographically-proven evidence for auditors.

steps.title: Verify Policy Compliance in The Guard
steps.description: Show auditors your policies are actually enforced. The Guard provides real-time compliance posture and violation history.

steps.title: Demonstrate AI Governance in The Ethics
steps.description: AI regulations are here. Show your bias testing, decision documentation, and ethical review processes.

steps.title: Explain AI Decisions with Cendia Glass
steps.description: When auditors ask 'why did the system decide this?', Glass provides complete explanations.

steps.title: Trace Data Lineage for Accuracy
steps.description: Prove your numbers are accurate by showing where they come from. The Lineage provides source-to-report traceability.

steps.title: Review Access Controls via Cendia Key
steps.description: Who had access to what and when? Key provides complete access audit trails for any time period.

steps.title: Identify At-Risk Customers with The Predict
steps.description: ML models analyze hundreds of signals to score churn risk. Know who's at risk before they know themselves.

steps.title: Understand Customer Health in The Helm
steps.description: Track customer health metrics. Usage trends, support tickets, engagement scores - all in one view.

steps.title: Explore Customer Journey in The Graph
steps.description: See the full customer story. Every interaction, every touchpoint, every signal - connected in context.

steps.title: Get Retention Recommendations from The Council
steps.description: Convene your AI advisors to brainstorm retention strategies. Each customer is unique - get personalized approaches.

steps.title: Trigger Retention Workflows in The Flow
steps.description: Turn recommendations into action. Automated outreach, escalations, and follow-ups keep nothing falling through cracks.

steps.title: Model Revenue Impact in The Lens
steps.description: Quantify what's at stake. The Lens shows the revenue impact of churn scenarios and intervention success.

productLaunch.title: Product Launch Orchestration
productLaunch.subtitle: Launch with confidence and real-time visibility

steps.title: Set Launch KPIs in The Helm
steps.description: Define success before you launch. Track adoption, performance, and business metrics in real-time.

steps.title: Verify Systems Ready in The Health
steps.description: Is everything green before launch? The Health gives you confidence that all systems are go.

steps.title: Simulate Launch Load in Cendia Mirror
steps.description: Test your launch scenario in a digital twin. See how systems behave under expected load.

steps.title: Monitor Real-Time in The Pulse
steps.description: Launch day visibility. Watch metrics, errors, and user behavior stream in as you launch.

steps.title: Respond to Issues via The Bridge
steps.description: When something needs adjustment, act fast. The Bridge lets you push changes across systems instantly.

steps.title: Capture Learnings in Cendia Legacy
steps.description: Document what worked and what didn't. Future launches will be better for it.

dataQualityImprovement.title: Data Quality Improvement Program
dataQualityImprovement.subtitle: Transform data from liability to asset

steps.title: Assess Current Quality in The Lineage
steps.description: You can't improve what you don't measure. The Lineage scores quality at every stage of your data journey.

steps.title: Track Quality Metrics in The Helm
steps.description: Make data quality a first-class KPI. Track completeness, accuracy, timeliness, and consistency over time.

steps.title: Set Quality Rules in The Guard
steps.description: Define and enforce quality standards. The Guard automatically validates data against your rules.

steps.title: Automate Quality Checks in The Flow
steps.description: Build quality into your pipelines. Automated checks run continuously, catching issues before they spread.

steps.title: Monitor Quality Health
steps.description: Watch quality trends across your data estate. Catch degradation early and celebrate improvements.

steps.title: Document Standards in Cendia Legacy
steps.description: Encode your quality standards for the organization. Make quality institutional, not individual.

securityThreatResponse.title: Security Threat Response
securityThreatResponse.subtitle: Detect, contain, and eliminate threats systematically

steps.title: Detect Threats in The Guard
steps.description: The Guard's threat detection engine surfaces suspicious activity. Prioritized by severity and confidence.

steps.title: Assess Blast Radius in The Lineage
steps.description: What systems and data could be affected? The Lineage maps the potential impact of the threat.

steps.title: Review Access Logs in Cendia Key
steps.description: Who accessed what and when? Key provides the forensic trail to understand the attack vector.

steps.title: Preserve Evidence in Cendia Witness
steps.description: Before containment changes evidence, capture the immutable record. You'll need this for investigation.

steps.title: Execute Containment via The Bridge
steps.description: Isolate the threat. The Bridge can revoke access, quarantine systems, and deploy countermeasures.

steps.title: Coordinate with The Council
steps.description: Bring in your AI security experts. They help analyze the attack and recommend comprehensive response.

sports.subtitle: Transfer decisions, contract governance, FFP compliance

dcii.subtitle: 9 primitives · IISS scoring · category-defining governance infrastructure
